overview.en: GRG(Rigo Token) is the utility token for governance and incentives of the RigoBlock protocol, a protocol to create and operate token pools, special purpose smart contracts which facilitate the organization of tokens and the interaction with decentralized exchanges.
overview.zh: GRG（Rigo Token）是用于RigoBlock协议的治理和激励的实用程序令牌，用于创建和操作令牌池的协议，用于促进令牌组织以及与分散交换的交互的专用智能合约。
